name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a proficient Senior DevOps Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in implementing and managing cloud architectures using **AWS**, **Terraform**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **Ansible**. My technical expertise includes extensive knowledge of CI/CD automation and infrastructure as code (IaC) principles, ensuring streamlined deployment processes and operational efficiency. I have a strong command of container orchestration and monitoring tools, including **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, and **Kafka**, paired with robust database management skills utilizing **Redis**, **Cassandra**, and **Elasticsearch**.

Additionally, I bring hands-on experience in scripting with **Bash**, **Python**, and **Ruby**, and possess familiarity with Unix environments and **JSON**. My background in full stack development has honed my ability to build and maintain high-performance applications leveraging **NodeJS** and various microservices. I've been instrumental in driving initiatives that meet compliance standards and improve system reliability, contributing significantly to organizational success.
